product.name: Net Kavach
product.details: A robust firewall solution designed to protect your network from cyber threats by offering multi-layered security and real-time threat analysis.
keyPoints: Advanced threat protection with AI-driven security
Real-time monitoring and instant threat detection
Seamless integration with existing IT infrastructure
DDoS protection and intrusion prevention system
Customizable security policies for network control

product.name: Data Kavach
product.details: An enterprise-grade data security solution that ensures end-to-end encryption, access control, and compliance adherence for critical data assets.
keyPoints: End-to-end encryption for secure data transmission
Granular access control with role-based permissions
Cloud and on-premise data security solutions
Automated compliance monitoring and reporting
Data loss prevention (DLP) to stop unauthorized leaks

product.name: AI Kavach
product.details: A cutting-edge cybersecurity solution powered by AI and machine learning to proactively detect and mitigate cyber threats before they cause damage.
keyPoints: AI-driven threat detection and risk analysis
Automated response to mitigate security breaches
Predictive analytics to anticipate cyber threats
Self-learning algorithms for continuous improvement
Seamless integration with security operation centers (SOCs)

product.name: GyaanBuddy DMS
product.details: A smart document management system powered by AI, streamlining knowledge organization, retrieval, and security.
keyPoints: AI-driven document classification and organization
Seamless search and retrieval with smart indexing
Robust access control and version management
Automated compliance tracking and auditing
Secure cloud and on-premise deployment options

product.name: AI QA Generator
product.details: An AI-powered question-answer generator designed to enhance learning, assessment, and knowledge evaluation.
keyPoints: Auto-generate quizzes, tests, and assessments
AI-driven content analysis for accurate question creation
Adaptive learning recommendations based on performance
Multi-format question generation: MCQs, descriptive, and more
Seamless integration with e-learning platforms

product.name: AI Based Security
product.details: A next-gen AI-powered security solution that proactively detects and neutralizes cyber threats in real time.
keyPoints: AI-driven threat detection and risk mitigation
Automated response to security breaches
Predictive analytics to anticipate cyber threats
Self-learning AI for continuous adaptation
Seamless integration with security operation centers (SOCs)

product.name: ZPulse NMS
product.details: A comprehensive network management system that provides real-time monitoring, analytics, and automation for seamless network operations.
keyPoints: AI-powered network monitoring and diagnostics
Real-time alerts and performance tracking
Automated fault detection and resolution
Seamless integration with existing IT infrastructure
Customizable dashboards for network insights

product.name: ZPulse CRM
product.details: An intelligent customer relationship management solution designed to enhance customer engagement, automate workflows, and drive business growth.
keyPoints: 360-degree customer insights and analytics
Automated lead management and sales tracking
Seamless integration with communication channels
AI-driven customer interaction predictions
Customizable workflows and reporting tools

product.name: ZPulse EMS
product.details: An enterprise management system that streamlines operations, optimizes resources, and enhances decision-making with AI-driven analytics.
keyPoints: Centralized enterprise resource planning
Automated workflow and process management
AI-driven insights for data-driven decision-making

Scalable and customizable for business needs
